009package imagingbook.sampleimages;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
012
013/**
014 * <p>
015 * Enumeration defining a set of {@link ImageResource} objects for selected sample images.
016 * Usage example:
017 * </p>
018 * <pre>
019 * import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020 * import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
021 * import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022 * 
023 * ImageResource ir = GeneralTestImage.Clown;
024 * ImageProcessor ip = ir.getImage().getProcessor();
025 * // process ip ...
026 * </pre>
027 * @see ImageResource
028 *
029 */
030public enum GeneralSampleImage implements ImageResource {
031        
032                /** Original: https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/images/blobs.gif */
033                Blobs,
034                
035                /** Original: https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/images/boats.gif */
036                Boats,
037                
038                /** A simple binary shape image with 0/255 values. */
039                Cat,
040                
041                /** Original: https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/images/clown.png */
042                Clown,
043                
044                /** Original: https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/images/Dot_Blot.jpg */
045                DotBlot,
046                
047                /** Grayscale image used for SIFT demos. */
048                IrishManor,
049                
050                /** Original gray scan from Kepler manuscript. */
051                Kepler,
052                
053                /** Binary image with a single connected component. */
054                MapleLeafSmall,
055                
056                /** Small grayscale image. */
057                MonasterySmall,
058        
059                /** Binary image with straight lines embedded in noise. */
060                NoisyLines,
061                /** Binary image with circles embedded in noise. */
062                NoisyCircles,
063                /** Binary image with ellipses embedded in noise. */
064                NoisyEllipses,
065
066                
067                /** TIFF image with attached ROI selection, used for trigonometric Fourier descriptors. */
068                HouseRoi("HouseRoi.tif"),
069
070                /** Fairly large binary image with 0/1 values. */
071                RhinoBigCrop,
072
073                /** A small binary image with 0/255 values (white background = 255). */
074                RhinoSmall,
075
076                /** A small binary image with 0/255 values and inverted LUT (white background = 0). */
077                RhinoSmallInv,
078                
079                /** Binary image with star-shaped regions, used for SIFT demos. */
080                Stars,
081                
082                /** Binary image with various tools, used for connected components segmentation. */
083                ToolsSmall,
084                
085                /** Color image, used for piecewise image warping. */
086                WartburgSmall("WartburgSmall.jpg"),
087                
088                /** Color image used for projective rectification. */
089                PostalPackageSmall("PostalPackageSmall.jpg"),
090                
091                /** Full-RGB color image used for various non-linear transformations. */
092                Flower("Flower.jpg"),
093
094                /** Indexed color image with 256 colors. */
095                FlowerIdx256("FlowerIdx256.tif"),
096                
097                /** Grayscale image used for MSER feature detection. */
098                MortarSmall,
099                
100                /** Grayscale image used for SIFT feature detection. */
101                Castle,
102                /** Grayscale stereo image used for SIFT feature detection and matching. */
103                RamsesSmall,
104                /** A stack of 2 small grayscale stereo frames used for SIFT feature detection and matching. */
105                RamsesSmallStack("RamsesSmallStack.tif"),
106
107                /** A stack of 2 small grayscale images used for linear blending. */
108                ShipBeachSmallStack("ShipBeachSmallStack.tif"),
109
110                /** A stack of small grayscale images used for histogram specification/matching. */
111                CityscapeSmallStack("CityscapeSmallStack.tif"),
112
113                /** A small color test image for evaluating effects of filters in different color spaces. */
114                ColorTest3,
115
116                /** A color image for testing color edge detectors. */
117                Balloons600("Balloons600.jpg"),
118
119                /** A poor-quality, noisy color image for testing edge-preserving smoothing. */
120                Postcard2c("Postcard2c.jpg"),
121
122                /** A binary image (inverted LUT) with circles and squares for chamfer matching. */
123                CirclesSquares,
124
125                ;
126
127                // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
128
129                private final String filename;
130
131                GeneralSampleImage() {
132                        this((String) null);
133                }
134
135                GeneralSampleImage(String filename) {
136                        this.filename = filename;
137                }
138
139                @Override
140                public String getFileName() {
141                        return (this.filename != null) ? this.filename : this.autoName();
142                }
143
144                // public static void main(String[] args) {
145                //      ImageResource ir = GeneralSampleImage.Balloons600;
146                //      System.out.println(ir.getRelativePath());
147                //      // System.out.println(ir.getImagePlus());
148                // }
149}
